modules.description: Encodes pixel data into a blur hash using a fixed set of parameters. It processes RGB pixel arrays and returns a compact string representation. Used to generate low-resolution previews for images in performance-sensitive applications.

Generates a blur hash from pixel data using specified grid dimensions and image size. It processes RGB(A) pixel data stored in a byte array, interpreting each pixel as a sequence of red, green, blue, and optionally alpha values. This is used to quickly create low-resolution previews of images for loading indicators or placeholder content.
